officialTitle: Influence of Spinal or Intravenous Dexmedetomidine on Spinal Anesthesia With Chloroprocaine and Bladder Function in Day-case Surgery. A Double Blind Randomized Study.
inclusionCriteria:
* ASA (American Society of Anesthesiologists) class 1 \& 2,
* undergoing day-case knee arthroscopy
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* micturition problems,
* neurological history or
* previous lower abdominal surgery with an abnormal micturition
